entry.value: #libraries%%00010library(plotly)%%00010library(gprofiler2)%%00010%%00010# data input - GENE names column %%00010data <-as.data.frame(knime.in, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)%%00010# convert gene names from factors (default by R) to strings%%00010data[] <- lapply(data, as.character)%%00010%%00010# take only the first value before the delimiter; convert it to strings%%00010delimiter <- knime.flow.in[["delimiter"]]%%00010#query_names <- as.data.frame(sapply(strsplit(data[,1], delimiter), '[', 1))%%00010#query_names[] <- lapply(query_names, as.character)%%00010colnames(data) <- c("QUERY_NAME")%%00010%%00010# organism%%00010organism_input <- knime.flow.in[["organism"]]%%00010%%00010# evidences%%00010evidences <- as.logical(knime.flow.in[["evidences"]])%%00010%%00010# IEA exclusion%%00010IEA_exclude <- as.logical(knime.flow.in[["IEA"]])%%00010%%00010# sources%%00010sources <- knime.flow.in[["sources"]]%%00010if (sources == "all") {%%00010%%00009sources <- NULL%%00010} else {%%00010%%00009sources <- as.character(sources) %%00010}%%00010%%00010# pvalue threshold%%00010pvalue_threshold <- knime.flow.in[["pvalue_threshold"]]%%00010%%00010# significant or all to retrieve%%00010significant <- as.logical(knime.flow.in[["significant"]])%%00010%%00010# correction method%%00010correction <- as.character(knime.flow.in[["correction"]])%%00010%%00010# run gene ontology%%00010gene_ontology <- gost(data$QUERY_NAME, organism = organism_input , ordered_query = FALSE,%%00010 multi_query = FALSE, significant = significant, exclude_iea = IEA_exclude,%%00010 measure_underrepresentation = FALSE, evcodes = evidences,%%00010 user_threshold = pvalue_threshold, correction_method = correction,%%00010 domain_scope = c("annotated"), custom_bg = NULL,%%00010 numeric_ns = "", sources = sources)%%00010%%00010

entry.key: Output non numbers (NaN, Inf, -Inf) as missing cells
